thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: Chris L
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Chris L

author: Chris L
title: Chris L
text:
Let's be honest here, Steam is a great platform and has some good games, maybe not as good as it used to be, but still great if your a gamer. There prices however are quite inflated really and it doesn't take a Googler long to find themselves a better deal. This is where the chaps at Bundle Stars come in. Affordable deals which more often than not puts even the mighty Valve/Steam to shame. So shave off them £££s. No, I don't work for Bundle Stars.. wish I did but there ya go...
5/5
